english.segment1: Last night. Stopping by. Greeting me with an embracing bad breath. Five A.M. You woke me out of a restless R.E.M. I think it's time. To sober up and die
english.segment2: Every little second is precious time. And every word seems to rhyme. I follow every word like streetlight. To make it home all right. Every little second flies. I hold on to them like pieces of paradise. I follow every word like streetlights. I want to fall in love and leave tonight
english.segment3: Been riding in the sunset. Ignoring what follows after beauty. Fades to black. Just riding in the sunset. Now this paralyzing cold. Always come crawling back. I think it's time. To sober up and live
